headline: As blizzard slams US Northeast, airlines report major disruptions
summary: A historic blizzard is slamming the US Northeast, accumulating a foot and a half of snow overnight from Sunday to Monday in New York City and across most of New Jersey, as the snow continues to fall. Morning Brief Host Julie Hyman reports remotely on the major disruptions reported by airlines today due to these weather conditions. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.
